sqlMap.select: select A.board_title, B.department_name, C.employee_name, to_char(A.board_create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') board_create_date, A.board_name from board A, department B, employee C where A.department_id = B.department_id and A.employee_id = C.employee_id

select a.board_id, a.board_title, b.department_name, c.employee_name, to_char(a.board_create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') board_create_date, a.board_name from board a, department b, employee c where a.department_id=b.department_id and a.employee_id=c.employee_id and b.department_id=c.department_id and a.board_create_date between TO_DATE(#search_date1#) and TO_DATE(#search_date2#) order by a.board_id desc
